thread.title: Melissa
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Melissa

author: Melissa
title: Melissa
text: Ordered a pair of ski goggles from this place and when I received them, the lens was scratched. I called their customer service and Geoff was absolutely awesome! He was able to send me a pair he personally inspected, refunded my shipping costs, and had my goggles to me in time for my vacation. Very friendly, and made the exchange an easy experience.
